reviews.review:
Truly a special game, it really doesn't deserve the neglect it's been getting. Every encounter with an enemy player unpredictable, making classes like spy and sniper based on trying to predict your opponents next move. Soldiers rocket jump and demoman's sticky launcher that show great design, trading mobility for the cost of self damage. Every class has something fun to learn, with the freedom of deigning your own weapon loadouts that can alter the class to keep gameplay fresh. Hope this game gets the attention it deserves from valve again....

[h1] Still fun after so many years [/h1]
Fun  multiplayer class shooter after so many years. Its a fair free to play formula with ability to unlock most the game offers with some features hidden behind paywalls and optional cosmetic purchases. 

The only downside is the annoying amount of bots flooding many games, that have the ability to mask their username, kick legitimate players and leave before getting kicked only to rejoin moments later. The community is rock solid (as always) in coming together to ensure the games go on.

Team Fortress 2 is such an amazing multiplayer game, it's really good playing with my buddies. The game modes are fun and the maps are amazing. However there is a lot of problems. Valve UPDATE THE FREAKING GAME. Valve says TF2 will be updated but the only thing that gets updated i the localization files and that is it. There has to be updates to make the game way more fun. Also BOTS. My God the bots in the game are so bad, the voting system is terrible and the bots don't even get banned. Overall, TF2 is amazing but Valve please please update the game

One of my all-time favorite FPS-games! This game has content that will never get old. With the sheer talent of both the community and Valve, this game still stands strong today, despite its very old age. (And sometimes lack of updates.)

[h1] Characters (Classes) [/h1]
There's 9 classes in TF2:
[b][url=https://wiki.teamfortress.com/wiki/Scout] Scout [/url][/b]
Real Name is Jeremy, born in Boston.
[i]  The youngest of eight boys from the south side of Boston, the Scout learned early how to solve problems with his fists. With seven older brothers on his side, fights tended to end before the runt of the litter could maneuver into punching distance, so the Scout trained himself to run. He ran everywhere, all the time, until he could beat his pack of mad dog siblings to the fray. (Wiki Bio) [/i]
[b][url=https://wiki.teamfortress.com/wiki/Soldier] Soldier [/url][/b]
Real name is Jane Doe, Midwest, USA
[i] Though he wanted desperately to fight in World War 2, the Soldier was rejected from every branch of the U.S. military. Undaunted, he bought his own ticket to Europe. After arriving and finally locating Poland, the Soldier taught himself how to load and fire a variety of weapons before embarking on a Nazi killing spree for which he was awarded several medals that he designed and made himself. His rampage ended immediately upon hearing about the end of the war in 1949. (Wiki Bio) [/i]
[b][url=https://wiki.teamfortress.com/wiki/Pyro] Pyro [/url][/b]
Name: Unknown, Where born: Unknown.
[i] Only two things are known for sure about the mysterious Pyro: he sets things on fire and he doesn't speak. In fact, only the part about setting things on fire is undisputed. Some believe his occasional rasping wheeze may be an attempt to communicate through a mouth obstructed by a filter and attached to lungs ravaged by constant exposure to his asbestos-lined suit. Either way, he's a fearsome, inscrutable, on-fire Frankenstein of a man. If he even is a man. (Wiki Bio) [/i]
[b][url=https://wiki.teamfortress.com/wiki/Demoman] Demoman [/url][/b]
Real Name is Tavish Finnegan DeGroot, Born in Ullapool, Skotland, UK.
[i] A fierce temper, a fascination with all things explosive, and a terrible plan to kill the Loch Ness Monster cost the six year old Demoman his original set of adoptive parents. Later, at the Crypt Grammar School for Orphans near Ullapool in the Scottish Highlands, the boy's bomb-making skills improved dramatically. His disposition and total number of intact eyeballs, however, did not.
Word of his proficiency with explosives spread, and it was not long before Crypt Grammar received two visitors; the Demoman's real parents, who lovingly explained that all Demomen are abandoned at birth until their skills manifest themselves, a long-standing, cruel, and wholly unnecessary tradition among the Highland Demolition Men. His unhappy childhood had ended, but his training had just begun.(Wiki Bio) [/i]
[b][url=https://wiki.teamfortress.com/wiki/Heavy] Heavy [/url][/b]
Real Name: Misha (Short for Mikhail), Born in Dzhugdzhur Mountains, Khabarovsk Krai, USSR.
[i] Like a hibernating bear, the Heavy appears to be a gentle giant. Also like a bear, confusing his deliberate, sleepy demeanor with gentleness will get you ripped limb from limb. Though he speaks simply and moves with an economy of energy that's often confused with napping, the Heavy isn't dumb; he's not your big friend and he generally wishes that you would just shut up before he has to make you shut up. (Wiki Bio) [/i]
[b][url=https://wiki.teamfortress.com/wiki/Engineer] Engineer [/url][/b]
Real Name: Dell Conagher, Born in Bee Cave, Texas, USA
[i] This amiable, soft-spoken good ol' boy from tiny Bee Cave, Texas loves barbeque, guns, and higher education. Natural curiosity, ten years as a roughneck in the west Texas oilfields, and eleven hard science PhDs have trained him to design, build and repair a variety of deadly contraptions. (Wiki) [/i]
[b] Medic [/b]
Omg, it's Medic. Real Name: Dr. Ludwig, born in Germany.
[b] Sniper [/b]
Sniper. Mr. Mundy. Born in New Zeeland. That's all, Im boored.
[b][url=https://wiki.teamfortress.com/wiki/Spy] Spy [/url][/b]
Nobody knows his name, alright? Born in France.
[i] He is a puzzle, wrapped in an enigma, shrouded in riddles, lovingly sprinkled with intrigue, express mailed to Mystery, Alaska, and LOOK OUT BEHIND YOU! but it is too late. You're dead. For he is the Spy - globetrotting rogue, lady killer (metaphorically) and mankiller (for real). (Wiki) [/i]
[hr][/hr]
[h1] Gameplay [/h1]
Scout: Fast guy, has 125 hp, captures points at x2 speed.
Soldier: Slow guy, has 200 hp, can rocket-jump.
Pyro: Normal speed, has 175 hp, can reflect rockets.
Demoman: Normal Speed: has 175 hp, can place sticky bombs or drop all this crap and be a Knight (No, rlly)
Heavy: Very Slow Guy, has 300 hp, can eat sAnDwICh (Heals him)
Engineer: Normal speed, has 125 hp, can build sentries, dispensers and Teleporters (Engineer Gaming)
Medic: Fast-Normal speed, has 150 hp, can heal ppl.
Sniper: Normal speed, has 125 hp, can headshot ppl.
SPY: Fast-Normal Speed, has 125 hp, can backstab ppl (kills ppl fast), can headshot with 1 revolver.
I would conquer the rest of the world in my banner, with my sword and with I who wields it.

Oyun her zamankinden bile daha güzel. 2015'deki o cringe festivalinden epey kurtulmuş. Peki buna rağmen neden tavsiye et(e)miyorum? Çünkü oyun hayatımda gördüğüm en büyük hile sayısına sahip ama yani her oyunda oyuncuların yarısından fazlası hileli oyunun hali iç burkucu ve Valve'da görünüşe göre öküz gibi oyuncu sayısına rağmen bu oyunu artık ciddiye almıyor. Çok üzücü ama galiba oyun bizzati kendi geliştiricisi tarafından zorla öldürülmeye çalışılıyor şu anda.

I think playing team fortress 2 is the greatest thing that ever happened to my life from watching meet the classes to the funny sfm videos. those were all the things that made me play tf2 back in 2016 my brother had a laptop and he downloaded tf2 and i used to play tons of hours in there i usually just play bots but hey guess im still playing with them am i right? its a joke if you didn't get it i digress. but now i spent half of the day playing this game its just super fun the community is strong many new players still try out to play this game but seeing its current state some new players would just leave cause it wont be fun getting sniped in the head and spamming the birthday noisemaker i just hope that valve would fix this game and listen to its fans. my point is if you want to try this game out go even if there are bots just leave that server and find a new one i could keep saying how good this game or i would just make a youtube video about it. my rating 4/5 sandviches.

This Game boils down to. Scout Soldier, Pyro, Demoman, Heavy, Engineer, Medic, Sniper, and Spy. First well start off with Scout its just this in a nutshell - What the fuck did you just fucking say about me, you little bitch? I'll have you know I graduated top of my class in the Navy Seals, and I've been involved in numerous secret raids on Al-Quaeda, and I have over 300 confirmed kills. I am trained in gorilla warfare and I'm the top sniper in the entire US armed forces. You are nothing to me but just another target. I will wipe you the fuck out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth, mark my fucking words. You think you can get away with saying that shit to me over the Internet? Think again, fucker. As we speak I am contacting my secret network of spies across the USA and your IP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm, maggot. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your life. You're fucking dead, kid. I can be anywhere, anytime, and I can kill you in over seven hundred ways, and that's just with my bare hands. Not only am I extensively trained in unarmed combat, but I have access to the entire arsenal of the United States Marine Corps and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable ass off the face of the continent, you little shit. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little "clever" comment was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have held your fucking tongue. But you couldn't, you didn't, and now you're paying the price, you goddamn idiot. I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in it. You're fucking dead, kiddo. it just that with Scout, Soldier - is just a fucking patriot who goes AHHHH SCREAMIN EAGLES and tears through enemys like there paper and can crit people with Spoon (market gardener) good class. Pyro - is just hunda hmm hudda hudda hmm. Demoman - is just a drunk african american who yeets pipe bombs at enemies and can also can shred through enemies with enough skill and practice good class. Heavy - best russian guy fun to play and shred hordes of enemies and can heal medics and other teammates with his trusty sandvich, but he is slow and not fun for everyone but also a good class not a lot of people play him. Engineer - i dont know what to say about him i just don't like him i barely play him at all. Medic - hes a good class to play if you want to help out the team and also be a screaming german guy there are also not of people who main medic he is a fun class to play. Sniper - Is just a australian bush man who can snip people from a far distance if the person playing sniper is skilled enough they can stop a whole server or stop a uber push if he can hit his shot. Spy - I personally main spy hes a fun class when you can pub stomp and you can stop a server and just go on huge chain kills and go on huge killstreaks my personal highest killstreak that i remember was at least 50, there are alot of great spy mains such as, Klown, Swipez, Starykrow hes hits disgusting with his headshots, Stabby Stabby, Slurgi, etc, Hes just a fun character

игра где на выбор есть 9 классов, Разведчик, Солдат, Поджигатель, Подрывник, Инженер, Снайпер, Пулемётчик, Медик, Шпион. Каждый из них чем то уникален. Объяснять это долго так что перейдём к самой игре, есть много режимов где нужно захватить либо развед-данные или захватить контрольную точку. в этой игре если просто играть с каким то шансом может случайно выпасть предмет когда вы перейдёте в меню нажатием кнопки escape то покажет то что вы получили предмет, если это кейс а деньги на ключ не хочется тратить вы можете либо его продать если у вас доступно торговля но вряд ли кто то купит кейс, может выпасть какое либо оружие, они разные либо статистиками либо полностью совершенно другое оружие. а так же с редким шансом может выпасть аксессуары будто шляпы либо одежда. в игре давно не выходило обновления... и видимо не выйдят но игра отлично держится на комьюнити советую игру. Эта игра целое исскуство нескольких технологий боя...

Despite this game being 14 years old, it's still a fantastic peace of work. With updates still coming out making the game better and better. You have the option to choose through 9 different characters. There are also lot's of different choices of games you can play like multiplayer, and also a training room where you can practice on bots. But overall it's still a fun game after 14 years.
